aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a tag key and value pair that is allowed in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a tag key and value pair of a resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by a list of tag keys that are allowed in the request

nimble:createdBy.description: Filters access by the createdBy request parameter or the ID of the creator of the resource

nimble:ownedBy.description: Filters access by the ownedBy request parameter or the ID of the owner of the resource

nimble:principalId.description: Filters access by the principalId request parameter

nimble:requesterPrincipalId.description: Filters access by the ID of the logged in user

nimble:studioId.description: Filters access by a specific studio
